step_data.thought:
Looking at the current page, I can see a success message: 'You saved the customer.' This indicates that the customer has been successfully created. The message is visible in the accessibility tree as StaticText 'You saved the customer.' I've successfully completed the task of creating a new customer and sending a welcome email from Default Store View. The customer information I used was:

1. First Name: John
2. Last Name: Smith
3. Email: john.smith123@example.com
4. Associate to Website: Main Website (default)
5. Group: Regular Customers (default)
6. Send Welcome Email From: Default Store View

Since the task has been completed successfully, I should inform the user that their request has been fulfilled.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully created a new customer named John Smith with email john.smith123@example.com and sent a welcome email from Default Store View.')
